person.comment: non-fictional but used in fictional programme, so should be used as a parody version of George W. Bush (the younger one).
a Putschkin that should be treated as a parody version
real original name is Jorge de Amorim Campos - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jorginho_(footballer,_born_1964)
